lexUnit.name: lie.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be in or assume a horizontal or resting position on a supporting surface.

sentence.text: They had taken refuge from the insects and the dew when sanity returned , and were lying gazing up at the stars .
I do n't see why he should lie stinking in bed all day when I am up and about .
No , he 'll be lying there wondering how to act ordinary , waiting for the anonymous car , the ring at the door .
Her third cup of tea she balanced on her stomach , lying full length on the bed and pointing her stockinged toes into the air , sighting various objects over them with one eye closed .
Stephen is lying full length on the grass , the dog curled inside his arm , snuffling against his shirt .
She was discovered lying half naked on the river bank .
That woman is many English children 's first encounter with death , lying there knees to chin , folded , flaking , tendons taut .
You were fucking lying there wrestling with your brother !
He demonstrated to me an Ergoline 35-tube sunbed in which a man lies full length .
It baffled her as to why she should feel a tingle in her veins just because Piers Morrison was lying only a few inches away from her .

` I saw him lying totally naked on a bed , " says Gerald Thomas , ` while the sister , who was quite formidable , was applying Savlon to his private parts .
Twice , three times now I 've seen this picture of a boy lying dead .

There was no time to turn round or to shove out the bloke lying across the seat so I sat down on him .
I next found myself lying at the bottom of a crude hopper of duck boards which was set on top of an irrigation dyke .
My first thought was that this was Dad lying at the foot of the stairs having killed himself .

But what was the agonised cry and the figure lying by the line side ?
To finish in style , we spent a luxurious four days in Palm Springs -- lying by the pool -- in temperatures of 120C , just enough to finish off the tan .
` Did the doctor say how long I must lie in my bed ? " he asked .
Elizabeth was propped up on the pillows , with the baby lying in the cradle by the bed .
Lying on his back , his legs spread wide , and occupying more than his fair share of the bed , he began to snore .
She was lying on her bed and , the moment I entered the room , I could see that something was wrong .
` The assassin must have been lying on the ground or Father standing on some steps ?
Greg is lying on one of the Palace 's luxuriant couches , gesticulating wildly and fixing me with a stare that is part ultimate artistic earnestness and part repressed pathological violence .
She was lying on one of the sofas in the drawing-room .
Lying on your tummy , raise your head and shoulders , curving the spine , inch by inch .
People take it easy here , lying under beach umbrellas , stretching out in the sun or slipping into the sea for a swim .
` I 'd lie under the covers and make the noise he makes when he 's breathing , and then I 'd stop , but sometimes it would go on after I 'd stopped ! "
He was lying under a pummelled blue van , with only his grease-streaked head and shoulders showing .
I was lying on top of the bed-covers , naked apart from my underpants .
I would lie for hours in my sea grey with the remains of bubble bath .
Perhaps he had visited the pirates during the night , when they were lying around their fire , full of rum .
Maybe she was lying out in the desert right now with her prettiness all ruined by bloody holes .
I would lie out in the midday sun and plaster myself in baby oil ! "
We lie out on the stones and talk ,
The room he was lying in was very small and dirty .

She 'd have looked a bit different , I can tell , from what she was like lying up there with her hair all cut off . "

The memory of him lying there does n't worry me , nor the memory of the blood trickling out of his body .
